urls.title: Free to Read: My 3 Thoughts on Brazil-Croatia
urls.description: This post is presented by TENLEGEND, The Gentlemen’s Football Brand Croatia advanced to the World Cup semifinals past Brazil in a jaw-dropping game decided by penalty kicks (4-2) after a 1-1 tie in which the Croatians equalized late in extra-time after Neymar had put Brazil ahead earlier in the extra stanza.

Brazil taken to the limit. Career-defining stuff from Neymar. 1-0.

I know Brazil knows this, but you do not want to go to penalties with Croatia.

urls.title: US Eliminated From The World Cup By The Netherlands + Catarina Macario
urls.description: Listen to this episode from Fútbol with Grant Wahl on Spotify. Grant and Chris Wittyngham do their postmortem on the USA's elimination from the World Cup by the Netherlands. What went wrong in this game, what did Gregg Berhalter get wrong, and where do the US go from here are among the questions asked and answered. Then, US Women's National Team and Lyon star Catarina Macario talks to Grant about her recovery from injury and the growth of her career. Learn more about your ad choices. urls.title: Future of Sports: U.S. in the World's Game - The Aspen Institute
urls.description: Soccer is the world’s language. So, what if we spoke it fluently? What if U.S. sports fans followed the game in a deep way, and not just during the FIFA World Cups? What if the opinionators on general sports talk shows knew how to talk fútbol like they do football? Would we feel more connected to other countries?

data.text: Looking forward to this @AspenInstSports panel on December 15 at noon ET with @gwenoxenham @georgedohrmann @TomFarrey & @docta_ash. You can register here: https://t.co/zSv6BBgekf

@daniellevslaton Good point. He wasn't like this at Everton either!

@away_goals @USMNT_2026 @SavingGraceSC @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod @HenryBushnell Saying “lots of parties” said Gio had hamstring issues is a distortion of what they were saying on the ground here. Doesn’t mean that wasn’t what was really happening, but it was certainly not the message any of them were communicating.
@away_goals @USMNT_2026 @SavingGraceSC @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod @HenryBushnell Ok. There are lots of quotes after those saying it was “coach’s decision” and he wasn’t hurt.

@away_goals @SavingGraceSC @USMNT_2026 @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod "lots of parties including gio and berhalter said he reaggravated the hammy to some degree in/ahead of the closed door friendly" I haven't seen this. Could you point me toward it?
@EmilyTOlsen @usatodaysports @Gannett I'm really sorry to see this Emily. You have done good work there!
Honestly, Richarlison has become my favorite Brazil player by a mile.
Holy smokes, Richarlison
Really thought this was Japan’s chance to make the quarterfinals. Beat Spain and Germany, won the group. But you don’t want to go to penalties with Croatia.
@pmphd23 Thanks!
Think the American referee Ismail Elfath has done well in this game and this World Cup. Could see him in the middle for more knockout-round games.
So many good balls into the box finally rewarded for Japan. The quality of these crosses has been 💯
@MartinKoenigsb2 I don't think that was a realistic number for that game at that time in anyone's minds.
@MartinKoenigsb2 Sounds like you don't know much about the context.
@MartinKoenigsb2 Yes

USA-Netherlands drew an average US TV audience of 16.6 million (13 million in English on Fox, 3.6 million in Spanish on Telemundo). Very good World Cup numbers for watching the USMNT. Should help in building excitement for hosting in 2026.
@EnswellJones The affection is there, don’t worry!
@EnswellJones Almost like putting a big game in Hamilton

urls.title: Premium: This U.S. World Cup is Over, but 2026 Awaits
urls.description: The USMNT got punished by the Netherlands in a 3-1 loss, and the aftermath mixed regrets over missed opportunities and excitement for World Cup 2026 at home.

data.text: As he had said before in the loss at Canada, Gregg Berhalter described the US as “dominant” at times in a 3-1 loss to the Netherlands. But “dominant” doesn’t just mean possessing the ball. New story: https://t.co/cX3ZVMguBk https://t.co/10kqGdc3aU
Jude Bellingham barreling up the middle is something to behold.

@Striker10SF Sorry, I don’t play the whataboutism game. Check my work record. I’ve written lengthy stories spending time with the Palestine national team and Arab players on the Israel team. I support equality and inclusion.

@Striker10SF Not when I was the one who chose to leave that place. It was a bad fit for people who wanted to do journalism, as we’ve seen in a number of cases here and at other World Cups. I’m really happy now professionally ✌️

urls.title: My 3 Thoughts on USMNT-Netherlands
urls.description: DOHA, Qatar — The USMNT lost to the Netherlands 3-1 in the World Cup Round of 16 on Saturday. The U.S. exits the tournament, while the Netherlands advances to the quarterfinals to meet Argentina or Australia.

data.text: RT @GrantWahl: My 3 Thoughts on Netherlands 3, USMNT 1 at the World Cup https://t.co/SPpqNM1Oon
Mailbag time! Send in your probing, thoughtful and/or amusing questions about the USMNT at the World Cup, and I’ll answer the best ones in a column. Thank you!

urls.title: My 3 Thoughts on USMNT-Netherlands
urls.description: DOHA, Qatar — The USMNT lost to the Netherlands 3-1 in the World Cup Round of 16 on Saturday. The U.S. exits the tournament, while the Netherlands advances to the quarterfinals to meet Argentina or Australia.

data.text: My 3 Thoughts on Netherlands 3, USMNT 1 at the World Cup https://t.co/SPpqNM1Oon
NETHERLANDS GOAL. Terrific finish from Dumfries, who has been phenomenal tonight. As with the other 2 Dutch goals, no American was marking the scorer. 3-1.
USA GOAL. Pulisic assists Wright, whose shot somehow finds its way in. 2-1 in the 77th minute. Hold onto your seats. 2-1.
Would it have been that hard to start Reyna at the No. 9 instead of Ferreira today instead of bringing him on at halftime in a 2-goal hole?
US needs to make attacking subs to start the second half. Not later. Now.
NETHERLANDS GOAL. Dagger right before halftime. Similar look to the 1st. Blind runs into space in the box uncovered, has a free shot. 2-0.
NETHERLANDS GOAL. Memphis with a run into the box uncovered, and he finishes for 1-0. First goal US has conceded in the run of play this World Cup.

urls.title: Good Rivals - Season 1
urls.description: The definitive documentary on the US and Mexico men's national soccer teams told through the lens of one of the fiercest rivalries in international sports. The series peels back the political, social and sporting layers of the rivalry through the eyes of Landon Donovan (US) and Rafael Márquez (MX), who became symbols of their countries’ soccer cultures. Third and final episode launches on Dec 1st.

@GrantWahl @USMNT_2026 @SavingGraceSC @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod @HenryBushnell did gregg ever say he "wasnt hurt" or did he just say that he was "available" because those are different things imo. mitigating risk is still a coach's decision

@USMNT_2026 @GrantWahl @SavingGraceSC @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod @HenryBushnell "available" doesnt mean "available with no risk"

we used him in as limited a capacity as possible in the group and then used him as much as we could in our knockout game which is good gio management
@SavingGraceSC @USMNT_2026 @Turberville @usmnt13 @scuffedpod @GrantWahl gio was hurt and we managed his minutes in the group to maximize his minutes in our most important match

This is my last week with @usatodaysports. I was part of the @Gannett layoffs.

My sadness is mostly because I’ll miss the phenomenal team and the work we did.

urls.description: ‎Show Fútbol with Grant Wahl, Ep US Eliminated From The World Cup By The Netherlands + Catarina Macario - Dec 3, 2022

urls.title: US Eliminated From The World Cup By The Netherlands + Catarina Macario
urls.description: Listen to this episode from Fútbol with Grant Wahl on Spotify. Grant and Chris Wittyngham do their postmortem on the USA's elimination from the World Cup by the Netherlands. What went wrong in this game, what did Gregg Berhalter get wrong, and where do the US go from here are among the questions asked and answered. Then, US Women's National Team and Lyon star Catarina Macario talks to Grant about her recovery from injury and the growth of her career. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

urls.title: My 3 Thoughts on USMNT-Netherlands
urls.description: DOHA, Qatar — The USMNT lost to the Netherlands 3-1 in the World Cup Round of 16 on Saturday. The U.S. exits the tournament, while the Netherlands advances to the quarterfinals to meet Argentina or Australia.
